column4: hey guys i followed this http://ashu-geek.blogspot.in/2012/03/banshee-240-released-with-dvd-playback.html and tried to upgrade banshee to 2.4
i am using ubuntu 10.04, but banshee seems not to be updated, any ideas ??
ubuntu never update it by itself. U have to download the new deb package and install or add the PPA
if u installed by adding the PPA then whenever new version available ubuntu will do the updation
